name: Trance X
description:
Trance X.
Reach the top if there is any...

The best looking stack builder game ever made.
And without a doubt the most technically advanced, best looking Apple Watch game ever created.

• iOS 13 & Apple Watch exclusive game.
• Apple Watch running without App Installation
• Made for Apple Watch series 4 & 5. Best gaming
experience on 40mm, 42mm & 44mm.
• Utilizes the best of your device using real Apple Metal Support 
without overhead.
• Haptic feedback support on iOS and Apple Watch.
• Custom made Music, Art and Code by Arcana Art.
• Super optimized app-size & loading time.
• No additional downloads.
• No AD's nor 3:rd party code used
• 60fps & 120fps support (Smooth gaming experience)
• Game Center support.
